name: change-table-visualization-settings
description: This tool is used only to show or hide columns on a table visualization. Make sure that the visualization type is `table` before calling this tool. Must not use this tool to rename columns or change other column settings, there is change-column-settings tool for that.

visible_columns.description: List of columns to show in the table. To hide columns, include all but the ones you want to hide in the list.
